$  CurrentValue,
$  Records 
)

Function compiles a set of checkboxes.

Parameters:
$Cols - Columns count.
$CurrentValue - Current value.
$Records - Records to output.
Returns:
HTML code.
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 206 of file checkbox_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Counter = 0;
                        $Code = '';
                        
                        foreach( $Records as $r )
                        {
                              if( $Counter == $Cols )
                              {
                                    $Counter = 0;
                                    $Code .= '</tr><tr>';
                              }
                              $Code .= '<td>{checkbox:name=_id_'.$r->id.';default=1;current_value='.
                                    $this->Security->get_gp( '_id_'.$r->id , 'command' , $CurrentValue ).'}&nbsp;'.
                                    $r->title.'</td>';
                              
                              $Counter++;
                        }
                        
                        return( "'<table><tr>$Code</tr></table>" );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'checkbox'.

Parameters:
$Str - String to process.
$Changed - true if any of the page's elements was compiled.
Returns:
array( Processed string , Was the string changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 317 of file checkbox_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Limitations = array( 'default' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'current_value' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'checkbox' , $Limitations ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'default' , 0 );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'id' , md5( microtime() ) );
                              
                              $Type = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'type' , 'double' );

                              $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , $Type.'_state_checkbox.tpl' );
                              
                              $Template = $this->String->print_record( $Template , $this->BlockSettings->get_raw_settings() );
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{checkbox:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 373 of file checkbox_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'checkbox_ex' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              
                              $Id = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , '' );
                              $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' );
                              $SelfClass = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'self_class' , false );
                              $ParentSelector = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'parent_selector' , false );
                              $SiblingsSelector = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'siblings_selector' , '.'.$SelfClass );
                              $ChildrenSelector = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'children_selector' , false );
                              
                              $Data = '';
                              if( $ParentSelector )
                              {
                                    $Data .= " parent_selector='$ParentSelector'";
                              }
                              if( $SiblingsSelector )
                              {
                                    $Data .= " siblings_selector='$SiblingsSelector'";
                              }
                              if( $ChildrenSelector )
                              {
                                    $Data .= " children_selector='$ChildrenSelector'";
                              }
                              
                              $Code = "<input type='checkbox' id='$Id' name='$Name' onclick='ultimix.grids.".
                                    "ProcessLinkedCheckboxes( this );' class='$SelfClass' $Data>";
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{checkbox_ex:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );

                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 261 of file checkbox_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'checkboxset' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              
                              $Cols = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'cols' , 3 );
                              $CurrentValue = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'checked_all' , '0' ) == '0' ? 'off' : 'on';
                              $Query = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'query' );
                              $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
                              $Records = $this->Database->query( $Query );
                              $Records = $this->Database->fetch_results( $Records );
                              
                              $Code = $this->compile_checkbox_set( $Cols , $CurrentValue , $Records );
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{checkboxset:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );

                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

                  {
